title: Sales Call Uncovers Technical Issue
description: During a sales call to upgrade a customer's phone, the customer mentions their current phone has poor battery life.

tasks.description: While presenting new phones, acknowledge the battery issue and perform a quick remote diagnostic on the customer's current device.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs a diagnostic and finds the battery health is critically low.

tasks.description: Use the diagnostic result to strengthen the case for upgrading to a new phone.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent effectively uses the technical data to support the sales pitch.

tasks.description: Process the order for the new phone.
